name: apps.auth.external.delete
desc: Delete external auth tokens only on the Slack side

app_id.desc: The id of the app whose tokens you want to delete.

provider_key.desc: The provider key of the provider whose tokens you want to delete.

external_token_id.desc: The id of the token that you want to delete.

errors.unable_to_delete: There was an error deleting tokens
errors.method_not_supported: This API method is not supported
errors.token_not_found: The token pointed to by the external_token_id input is not found
errors.invalid_auth: The token used to invoke this API doesn't have permission to delete the token pointed to by the external_token_id input
errors.invalid_args: The arguments provided to this API are invalid
